message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product which has been meticulously designed to revolutionize your industry. With its cutting-edge features and unparalleled capabilities, this product is poised to significantly enhance your operations and profitability. We are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950000, reflecting our confidence in its ability to deliver exceptional value to you. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider this opportunity carefully.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value your product brings to my industry. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $850000 for the product.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your perspective and respect your valuation. In light of your counteroffer, we would like to present a revised price of $900000 for the product. This price reflects our commitment to finding a mutually beneficial solution while still ensuring that we receive fair compensation for our efforts and innovation.
I've reviewed your revised offer, Alice. While I appreciate the adjustment, I would like to submit a counteroffer of $875000 for the product.

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. Considering your latest proposal, we are prepared to offer the product to you for $890000. This price reflects our desire to accommodate your budgetary considerations while still maintaining a reasonable profit margin for us.
After careful consideration, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $880000 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. We appreciate your willingness to negotiate. In response, we are proposing a price of $895000 for the product. This figure aims to balance our expectations with your current budget constraints.
I've reviewed your latest proposal, Alice. Based on my assessment, I would like to submit a counteroffer of $885000 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. We understand your position and would like to respond with a price of $892500 for the product. This price aims to find a middle ground between our initial asking price and your most recent proposal.
After further deliberation, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $890000 for the product.

Thank you for your latest counteroffer, Bob. We appreciate your effort to reach a mutual agreement. In response, we are willing to accept a price of $893750 for the product. This price reflects our commitment to finding a solution that is fair for both parties.
I've considered your latest offer, Alice. Based on my calculations and needs, I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $892500 for the product.
